title: ArcGIS Location Services Meta-Package
text: NOTE: active development! ’d love hear like use locations services R packages. Please start discussion ’ll get back ! arcgis meta-package loads ArcGIS location services packages. writing, includes packages {arcgislayers}, {arcgisutils}. arcgislayers workhorse package interacts feature services image servers arcgisutils developer oriented package used crafting requests used location service packages arcgislayers Please refer arcgislayers package site examples.

title: ArcGIS Location Services Meta-Package
text: can install development version arcgis GitHub :

title: ArcGIS Location Services Meta-Package
code: library(arcgis) #> Attaching core arcgis packages: #>   - {arcgisutils} v0.1.0 #>   - {arcgislayers} v0.1.0  health_rankings_url <- "https://services.arcgis.com/P3ePLMYs2RVChkJx/arcgis/rest/services/2022_County_Health_Rankings/FeatureServer"  arc_open(health_rankings_url) #> <FeatureServer <3 layers, 0 tables>> #> CRS: 4326 #> Capabilities: Query,Extract #>   0: Country (esriGeometryPolygon) #>   1: State (esriGeometryPolygon) #>   2: County (esriGeometryPolygon)

what: arcgis: ArcGIS Location Services Meta-Package — arcgis-package
title: arcgis: ArcGIS Location Services Meta-Package — arcgis-package
text: Provides easy installation loading core ArcGIS location services packages 'arcgislayers' 'arcgisutils'. Enabling developers interact spatial data services 'ArcGIS Online', 'ArcGIS Enterprise', 'ArcGIS Platform'. Learn 'arcgis' meta-package https://r.esri.com/r-bridge-site/.

title: arcgis: ArcGIS Location Services Meta-Package — arcgis-package
List all arcgis packages — arcgis_packages
text: include_self default TRUE. Includes arcgis package name resultant character vector.

title: List all arcgis packages — arcgis_packages
